[1G[0J> [3G/workflow

🔄 Workflow Management

Available workflows:
  auto-repair - Automatically fix failing tests and builds
  code-review - AI-powered code review
  deployment - Deployment workflow
  test-debug - Debug failing tests

Commands:
  execute <workflow> - Execute a workflow
  rollback <id>      - Rollback a workflow

Examples:
  cloi workflow execute auto-repair
  cloi workflow execute code-review --context '{"pr": 123}'
  cloi workflow rollback abc123

[1G[0J> [3G/a2a

🤖 Agent-to-Agent Protocol

The A2A protocol enables multi-AI collaboration for complex debugging tasks.

Commands:
  start  - Start A2A server for external AI connections
  stop   - Stop the running A2A server
  status - Show current A2A server status
  setup  - Setup A2A integration with external AIs

Examples:
  cloi a2a start --port 9090
  cloi a2a start --port 9090 --ai claude-code
  cloi a2a setup --ai github-copilot

Supported AI Integrations:
  • Claude Code (claude-code)
  • GitHub Copilot (github-copilot)
  • Universal (universal) - Works with any A2A-compatible AI
